title: Analysis of DDC numbers in K10plus union catalogue
description: This dataset contains an analysis of DDC notations in K10plus union catalogue.

sources.title: Normalized subject indexing data of K10plus library union catalog

resources.description: sorted DDC notations found in K10plus records, each with number of records it is used in
full analysis of DDC notations in newline-delimited JSKOS (including incomplete analysis and non-atomic elements)
atomic DDC elements from decomposition. First column is original number, following columns are atomic elements
atomic DDC numbers found in fully decomposed numbers of K10plus catalogue

fields.name: atom
fields.description: atomic DDC number which cannot be decomposed further

fields.name: number
fields.description: number of distinct DDC numbers this atom is used in

fields.name: records
fields.description: number of K10plus records this atom is used in
